citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10AM on
27-Nov-18.
After arriving, knocked on front door and rang the door bell. No answer. Went back to the vehicle and honked the
horn. Called the listed phone number and left a message. Waited 30 minutes before leaving.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10AM on
27-Nov-18.
After arriving, knocked on front door and rang the door bell.  No answer.  Went back to the vehicle and honked the
horn.  Called the listed phone number and left a message.  Waited 30 minutes before leaving.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
